title: A Coach-Based Quality-Diversity Approach for Multi-agent Interpretable Reinforcement Learning

abstract: Thanks to the advances in deep Reinforcement Learning (RL) and its demonstrated capabilities to perform complex tasks, the field of Multi-Agent RL (MARL) has recently undergone major developments. However, current MARL approaches based on …
